articles.author: Nicole Winfield
articles.title: JD Vance visits Italy for tariff talks and attends Good Friday service at the Vatican - AP News
articles.description: U.S. Vice President JD Vance is in Rome for talks on tariffs with Italian Premier Giorgia Meloni. The White House suggested a broader U.S.-Europe summit was under consideration and that President Donald Trump plans to visit soon. Vance also attended Good Frid…
articles.content: ROME (AP) U.S. Vice President JD Vance met with Italian Premier Giorgia Meloni in Rome on Friday for a second day of talks on tariffs and then attended Good Friday services at the Vatican amid specul… [+4906 chars]
